reviewText: It will not play on my dvd players, what a ripoff
A Christmas gift for me, myself, and I. All three of us love it!

Product received in good condition and timely.  I didn't realize that there were different standards that wouldn't work world wide.  The DVD's will not play on any of my DVD players.  I guess it's kind of a live and learn situations.  Not the sellers fault.
Cool flicks.  Happily we had a DVd player that didn;t care about the country code.

I loved the movie, but I was dissappointed that I could only watch it on my computer. When I order a movie we like to watch it together, and thats not possible in my computer room grandmabea200281022@yahoo.com
